member.summary: Lets you consume changes from the _changes stream.

member.name: M:MyCouch.IChanges.GetAsync``1(MyCouch.Requests.GetChangesRequest)
member.summary: Lets you consume changes from the _changes stream. Included doc will be deserialized as .
member.typeparam: The type used to deserialize any included doc as. Supports string for JSON, which is the same as using the non generic overload.
member.remarks: Only supports Normal and Long-polling feed. For Continuous feed, see .

member.name: M:MyCouch.IChanges.GetAsync(MyCouch.Requests.GetChangesRequest,System.Action{System.String},System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Lets you consume changes continuously from the _changes stream.

Used to end the reading of the stream.

member.summary: Gets information about the database.

member.name: M:MyCouch.IDatabase.HeadAsync
member.summary: Returns the HTTP Headers containing a minimal amount of information about the specified database. Since the response body is empty, using the HEAD method is a lightweight way to check if the database exists already or not.

member.summary: Creates the database, but only if it does not already exist.

member.name: T:MyCouch.IDocuments
member.summary: Used to access and manage documents. If you want to work with entities, POCOs, use instead, via .

member.summary: Lets you use the underlying bulk API to insert, update and delete documents.

member.name: M:MyCouch.IDocuments.CopyAsync(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Copies the document having a document id matching to a new document with a new id being . For more options use instead.

member.name: M:MyCouch.IDocuments.CopyAsync(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Copies the document having a document id matching and rev matching to a new document with a new id being . For more options use instead.

member.name: M:MyCouch.IDocuments.CopyAsync(MyCouch.Requests.CopyDocumentRequest)
member.summary: Copies the document having a document id matching .SrcId to a new document with a new id being .NewId. You can also specify a specific revision to copy via .SrcRev.

member.name: M:MyCouch.IDocuments.ReplaceAsync(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Replaces the document having a document id matching and rev with the document having id matching .

member.summary: Replaces the document having a document id matching and rev with the document having id matching and rev matching .

member.summary: Copies the document having a document id matching .SrcId to a new document with a new id being .NewId. You can also specify a specific revision to copy via .SrcRev.

member.summary: Inserts or Updates. If _id in is different than the one specified in , the one in will be used. If _rev in is different than the one specified in , the one in will be used.

member.name: M:MyCouch.IDocuments.PutAsync(MyCouch.Requests.PutDocumentRequest)
member.summary: Inserts or Updates. If _id in Content of is different than the one specified in Id of , the one in Id of will be used. If _rev in Content of is different than the one specified in Rev of , the one in Rev of will be used.

member.name: T:MyCouch.IMyCouchStore
member.summary: A somewhat opinionated abstraction over MyCouch which removes the use of Http-responses and lets you work directly with the entities. Also, provides you with queries via observables. If a non successful operation, an exception is thrown.

member.name: T:MyCouch.IQueryParameters
member.summary: The different common query parameters that can be specified when performing a query against a View-index.

member.name: P:MyCouch.IQueryParameters.ViewIdentity
member.summary: Identitfies the view that the Query will be performed against.

member.name: P:MyCouch.IQueryParameters.Stale
member.summary: Allow the results from a stale view to be used.

member.name: P:MyCouch.IQueryParameters.IncludeDocs
member.summary: Include the full content of the documents in the return.

member.name: P:MyCouch.IQueryParameters.Descending
member.summary: Return the documents in descending by key order.

member.name: P:MyCouch.IQueryParameters.Key
member.summary: Return only documents that match the specified key.

member.name: P:MyCouch.IQueryParameters.Keys
member.summary: Returns only documents that matches any of the specified keys.

member.name: P:MyCouch.IQueryParameters.HasKeys
member.summary: Indicates if any has been specified.

member.name: P:MyCouch.IQueryParameters.StartKey
member.summary: Return records starting with the specified key.

member.name: P:MyCouch.IQueryParameters.StartKeyDocId
member.summary: Return records starting with the specified document ID.

member.name: P:MyCouch.IQueryParameters.EndKey
member.summary: Stop returning records when the specified key is reached.

member.name: P:MyCouch.IQueryParameters.EndKeyDocId
member.summary: Stop returning records when the specified document ID is reached.

member.name: P:MyCouch.IQueryParameters.InclusiveEnd
member.summary: Specifies whether the specified end key should be included in the result.

member.name: P:MyCouch.IQueryParameters.Skip
member.summary: Skip this number of records before starting to return the results.

member.name: P:MyCouch.IQueryParameters.Limit
member.summary: Limit the number of the returned documents to the specified number.

member.name: P:MyCouch.IQueryParameters.Reduce
member.summary: Use the reduction function.

member.name: P:MyCouch.IQueryParameters.UpdateSeq
member.summary: Include the update sequence in the generated results.

member.name: P:MyCouch.IQueryParameters.Group
member.summary: The group option controls whether the reduce function reduces to a set of distinct keys or to a single result row.

member.name: P:MyCouch.IQueryParameters.GroupLevel
member.summary: Specify the group level to be used.

member.summary: Contains the string representation (Key) of individual options for .

member.name: P:MyCouch.Requests.GetChangesRequest.Feed
member.summary: Select the type of changes feed to consume.

member.name: P:MyCouch.Requests.GetChangesRequest.Style
P:MyCouch.Requests.GetChangesRequest.Since
member.summary: Start the results from the change immediately after the given sequence number.

member.name: P:MyCouch.Requests.GetChangesRequest.Limit
member.summary: Limit number of result rows to the specified value.
member.remarks: Using 0 here has the same effect as 1: get a single result row

member.name: P:MyCouch.Requests.GetChangesRequest.Descending
member.summary: Return the change results in descending sequence order (most recent change first)

member.name: P:MyCouch.Requests.GetChangesRequest.Heartbeat
member.summary: Set a millisecond value to have CouchDbReport to send a newline at every tick where the length between the ticks is the value you define.

member.name: P:MyCouch.Requests.GetChangesRequest.Timeout
member.summary: Maximum period in milliseconds to wait for a change before the response is sent, even if there are no results.
member.remarks: Only applicable for longpoll or continuous feeds. 60000 is also the default maximum timeout to prevent undetected dead connections.

member.name: P:MyCouch.Requests.GetChangesRequest.IncludeDocs
member.summary: Determines if the response should include the docs that are affected by the change(s).

member.name: P:MyCouch.Requests.GetChangesRequest.Filter
member.summary: Set to a designdoc/filtername to reference a filter function from a design document to selectively get updates.

member.name: M:MyCouch.Requests.PutDocumentRequest.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Used for creating new documents. How-ever, If contains _rev, it will be possible to update documents.

member.name: M:MyCouch.Requests.PutDocumentRequest.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Used for updating documents.

member.summary: Only system views like all_docs could be queried without specifying a designDocument. If a custom view is being targetted, use other cTor.

member.name: P:MyCouch.Requests.QueryViewRequest.ViewIdentity
member.summary: Identitfies the View index that this request will be performed against.

member.name: P:MyCouch.Requests.QueryViewRequest.Stale
member.summary: Allow the results from a stale view to be used.

member.name: P:MyCouch.Requests.QueryViewRequest.IncludeDocs
member.summary: Include the full content of the documents in the return.

member.name: P:MyCouch.Requests.QueryViewRequest.Descending
member.summary: Return the documents in descending by key order.

member.name: P:MyCouch.Requests.QueryViewRequest.Key
member.summary: Return only documents that match the specified key.

member.name: P:MyCouch.Requests.QueryViewRequest.Keys
member.summary: Returns only documents that matches any of the specified keys.

member.name: P:MyCouch.Requests.QueryViewRequest.HasKeys
member.summary: Indicates if any has been specified.

member.name: P:MyCouch.Requests.QueryViewRequest.StartKey
member.summary: Return records starting with the specified key.

member.name: P:MyCouch.Requests.QueryViewRequest.StartKeyDocId
member.summary: Return records starting with the specified document ID.

member.name: P:MyCouch.Requests.QueryViewRequest.EndKey
member.summary: Stop returning records when the specified key is reached.

member.name: P:MyCouch.Requests.QueryViewRequest.EndKeyDocId
member.summary: Stop returning records when the specified document ID is reached.

member.name: P:MyCouch.Requests.QueryViewRequest.InclusiveEnd
member.summary: Specifies whether the specified end key should be included in the result.

member.name: P:MyCouch.Requests.QueryViewRequest.Skip
member.summary: Skip this number of records before starting to return the results.

member.name: P:MyCouch.Requests.QueryViewRequest.Limit
member.summary: Limit the number of the returned documents to the specified number.

member.name: P:MyCouch.Requests.QueryViewRequest.Reduce
member.summary: Use the reduction function.

member.name: P:MyCouch.Requests.QueryViewRequest.UpdateSeq
member.summary: Include the update sequence in the generated results.

member.name: P:MyCouch.Requests.QueryViewRequest.Group
member.summary: The group option controls whether the reduce function reduces to a set of distinct keys or to a single result row.

member.name: P:MyCouch.Requests.QueryViewRequest.GroupLevel
member.summary: Specify the group level to be used.
